import React from 'react'; import { LanguageContext } from '../../context/LanguageContext'; class NavigationBar extends React.Component { static contextType = LanguageContext; render() { let navItems = this.context.header.navbar, langSelection = navItems.langSelection; return (
  • {navItems.about}
  • {navItems.wallet}
  • {navItems.whitepaper}
  • {navItems.roadmap}
  • {navItems.financing}
  • {navItems.faq}
  • {langSelection.active.flag} {langSelection.active.text}
    English Español Português
); } } export default NavigationBar;
